name: Sticky Hold
summary: Prevents the item from being removed through Covet, Thief, Trick, Switcheroo, Bug Bite, Pluck, or Knock Off.
viability: With how common Knock Off and Trick are, it's probably a good idea to keep your item whenever possible. The only problem is that all the Pok√©mon with Sticky Hold have an ability that better suits their need. Sticky Hold is good, but not good enough.
